To get your API key:
1. Log in to your Plausible Analytics account
2. Click your account name in the top-right menu and go to **Settings**
3. Go to **API Keys** in the left sidebar
4. Click **New API Key**, choose **Sites API**, and save the key
Get a list of teams your Plausible accou: 获取您可播放账户访问的团队列表
Get a list of sites your Plausible accou: 获取您可以访问的站点列表
Get details of a site including tracker: 获取网站详细信息，包括Tracker脚本配置
Create a new site in your Plausible acco: 在您的可播放帐户中创建一个新站点
Update an existing site in your Plausibl: 更新您可播放帐户中的现有站点
Delete a site and all its data from your: 从您的可播放帐户中删除站点及其所有数据。此操作是永久性的，可能需要48小时完成。
Find or create a shared link for a site: 查找或创建站点共享链接
Get a list of custom properties for a si: 获取站点自定义属性列表
Create a custom property for a site: 为站点创建自定义属性
Delete a custom property from a site: 从站点删除自定义属性
Invite a guest to access a site or find: 邀请访客访问一个站点或找到现有邀请
Remove a guest or invitation from a site: 从站点移除访客或邀请
Domain of the site (must be globally uni: 站点的域 (必须是全局唯一)
Timezone name according to IANA database: 根据IANA数据库的时区名称(如：欧洲/伦敦)，默认值为 Etc/UTC
Enable hash-based routing for single-pag: 为单页应用程序启用基于哈希的路由
Track clicks on outbound links: 跟踪对出站链接的点击
New domain name for the site (leave empt: 站点的新域名(留空以保持当前)
Name of the event (required if goal type: 事件名称 (目标类型为事件时需要)
Page path to track (required if goal typ: 要跟踪的页面路径(目标类型是页面时需要)。支持通配符。
Custom display name for the goal in the: 自定义仪表盘目标显示名称
